description:
A beautiful, big-breasted, glasses wearing office lady. But her luck with men is abysmal, and since she`s always getting thrown around and dumped by different men, her mood swings are fierce, and sometimes http://anidb.net/ch63440 [Usa] and http://anidb.net/ch63439 [Shiro] become the victims of such a swing.
Source: ANN
name: Nishikino Mayumi
